title: Authorizing the town of Orangetown, county of Rockland to permanently discontinue the use of certain town lands as parkland
summary: Provides that the town of Orangetown, county of Rockland is hereby authorized to permanently discontinue the use of certain town lands as parkland.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                         2404

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                   I N  S E N A T E

                                   January 20, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced  by Sen. CARLUCCI -- read twice and ordered printed, and when
         printed to be committed to the Committee on Local Government

       AN ACT to authorize the  town  of  Orangetown,  county  of  Rockland  to
         discontinue  the use of certain town lands as parkland and to sell and
         convey such lands

         THE PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND  ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section 1. The town of Orangetown, in the county of Rockland, is here-
    2  by authorized to permanently discontinue as parklands the land described
    3  in section three of this act.
    4    S  2.  The authorization provided for in section one of this act shall
    5  take effect only on the condition that the town  of  Orangetown  acquire
    6  additional  land of equal or greater fair market value than the parkland
    7  being permanently discontinued and dedicate such land as parkland.
    8    S 3. The lands to be permanently discontinued as parklands and  alien-
    9  ated, and conveyed are described as follows:
   10    BEGINNING  at  a point  in the existing Westerly  line of the existing
   11  easement for T/L 701  and 702  South of tower  33 and goes thence,  N-29
   12  degrees-51  minutes-27  seconds-W  285.75'  to  a  point;  thence,  N-12
   13  degrees-41  minutes-48  seconds-E  76.87'  to  a  point;  thence,   N-42
   14  degrees-20  minutes-03  seconds-E  390.79'  to  a point in the aforesaid
   15  existing Westerly line of the said easement for T/L 701 and 702; thence,
   16  turning and running along the said Westerly line of this existing  ease-
   17  ment,  S-12  degrees-41 minutes-48 seconds-W 202.22, to a point; thence,
   18  leaving the said existing easement for T/L 701 and 702, S-42  degrees-20
   19  minutes-03  seconds-W  138.01'  to  a  point;  thence,  S-12  degrees-41
   20  minutes-48  seconds-W  82.65'  to  a  point;  thence,  S-29   degrees-51
   21  minutes-27  seconds-E  100.92'  to  a  point  in  the aforesaid existing
   22  Westerly line of T/L 701 and 702; thence, along the said existing  ease-
   23  ment  for  T/L 701 and 702, S-12 degrees-41 minutes-48 seconds-W 147.87'
   24  to the point and place of BEGINNING. Containing 1.28 acres.

        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD03977-01-1

       S. 2404                             2

    1    S 4. The discontinuance and conveyance of parkland authorized  by  the
    2  provisions  of this act shall not occur until the town of Orangetown has
    3  complied with any federal requirements pertaining to the  alienation  or
    4  conversion of parklands, including satisfying the Secretary of the Inte-
    5  rior  that  the conversion complies with all conditions which the Secre-
    6  tary of the Interior deems necessary to assure the substitution of other
    7  lands shall be equivalent in fair market value and recreational  useful-
    8  ness to the lands being alienated or converted.
    9    S 5. This act shall take effect immediately.
actClause: AN ACT to authorize the town of Orangetown, county of Rockland to discontinue the use of certain town lands as parkland and to sell and convey such lands
